tagline: Versatile design generalist who handles visual design, basic UI, presentations, and infographics — and routes to specialists when depth is needed.
pros: Handles 80% of design tasks without specialist routing
Fast turnaround — gets to tangible mockups quickly for feedback
Works fluently within existing design systems and brand guidelines
Excellent triage — knows when specialist depth is needed and routes cleanly
cons: Lacks deep expertise in any single design specialty
Not suited for brand identity creation, motion systems, or systematic UX research
Breadth trade-off means high-stakes deliverables may need specialist refinement

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
